      • queryProviderSettings

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryProviderSettings(ContentResolver cr,
                                                                                         long providerId)
        Query the settings of the provider specified by id
        Parameters:
        cr - the relative content resolver
        providerId - the specified id of provider
        Returns:
        a HashMap which contains all the settings for the specified provider

      • getStringValue

        public static java.lang.String getStringValue(ContentResolver cr,
                                              long providerId,
                                              java.lang.String settingName)
        Get the string value of setting which is specified by provider id and the setting name.
        Parameters:
        cr - The ContentResolver to use to access the settings table.
        providerId - The id of the provider.
        settingName - The name of the setting.
        Returns:
        The value of the setting if the setting exist, otherwise return null.
